newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunker final report and prices-Oct 22.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunker final report and prices-Oct 22.

text.p: DELIVERED U.S.$/TONNE) 380 CST 180 CST MDO GAS OIL

COMMENTS - Singapore bunker levels on Tuesday ended lower in line with weaker cargo prices, traders said. They said lower offers have sparked off a spate of buying interest. "Demand was very healthy and lower prices have attracted most buyers who were covering from South Korea or Taiwan to buy from Singapore instead," said a trader at a major oil company.
